page.title: 07RECREATION - FOOTBALL.
page.content: MY PAL AND MYSELF ARE GOING TO TELL YOU ABOUT FOOTBALL AND ESPECIALLY ABOUT THE 'CANON' LEAGUE. HERE ARE THE RULES OF FOOTBALL. EACH TEAM HAS ELEVEN PLAYERS AND THE PITCH MEASURES BETWEEN 100M-110M LONG AND 64M-75M WIDE. THE CANON LEAGUE HAS 4 DIVISIONS WITH 22 TEAMS IN EACH. EACH SEASON EVERY TEAM IN THE LEAGUE PLAYS 42 GAMES. AT THE END OF THE SEASON THE TEAM IN DIVISION ONE WITH THE MOST POINTS WINS THE CANON LEAGUE TROPHY. NORMALLY LIVERPOOL WIN THE LEAGUE, BUT THIS YEAR (1985) THEIR GREAT RIVALS EVERTON WON IT AND LIVERPOOL CAME SECOND. THE MATCHES FOR THE CANON LEAGUE TAKE PLACE BETWEEN THE END OF AUGUST AND RUN UNTIL MAY THE FOLLOWING YEAR. THE TWO MAIN TROPHIES ARE THE MILK CUP AND THE FA CUP.
